text: The 24th World Masters Athletics Championships were scheduled to be held in Toronto, Canada, from 20 July to 1 August 2020. However, on 24 March 2020 it was announced that the event had been cancelled due to the COVID-19 pandemic. The World Masters Athletics Championships serve the division of the sport of athletics for people over 35 years of age, referred to as Masters athletics. ==References== Category:World Masters Athletics Championships World Masters Athletics Championships World Masters Athletics Championships World Masters Athletics Championships
title: 2020 World Masters Athletics Championships
